fullText: This Sinatra-scored dance musical, conceived and directed by Twyla Tharp, is a slick, professionally executed piece of entertainment that never quite takes flight.
dtliExcerpt: This Sinatra-scored dance musical, conceived and directed by Twyla Tharp, is a slick, professionally executed piece of entertainment that never quite takes flight.
